name: Your Name
summary: Experienced AI/ML Engineer with 5+ years developing scalable machine learning systems and deep learning applications. Proven track record in building production ML pipelines, optimizing model performance, and leading cross-functional teams. Passionate about advancing AI technology and its real-world applications.

responsibilities: Lead development of computer vision models achieving 95% accuracy for autonomous vehicle perception
Built end-to-end ML pipeline processing 10TB+ daily data using Apache Spark and Kubernetes
Optimized deep learning inference latency by 60% through CUDA kernels and TensorRT optimization
Mentored team of 5 junior engineers and established ML best practices across organization
Collaborated with product teams to deploy 15+ ML models serving 1M+ users daily
Developed NLP models for sentiment analysis and text classification with 90%+ F1 score
Implemented real-time recommendation system increasing user engagement by 35%
Created MLOps infrastructure using Docker, Jenkins, and AWS SageMaker for model deployment
Designed A/B testing framework for ML model evaluation and performance monitoring
Reduced model training time by 40% through distributed training on GPU clusters
Built predictive models for customer churn reduction achieving $2M annual revenue impact
Developed time series forecasting models for inventory optimization with 85% accuracy
Created interactive dashboards using Plotly and Streamlit for business stakeholders
Performed statistical analysis on large datasets to drive data-driven business decisions
Collaborated with engineering teams to productionize models and ensure scalability
